metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0474 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in GuestView in Google Chrome prior to 109.0.5414.119allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a Chrome web app. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
